code: import React from'react';import'./Hero.css';import myImg from'../../assets/my-img.jpg';import SocialLinks from'../Navbar/SocialLinks/SocialLinks';import Btn from'../Btn/Btn';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hero=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"section hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-center hero-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"hero-info animate","data-animate":"slideInLeft 2s",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"underline"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to my portfolio website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hello, I'm a full-stack developer based in Finland!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-btn-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Btn,{href:"#about",name:"about me",type:"hero-btn"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Btn,{href:"#projects",name:"projects",type:"hero-btn"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialLinks,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("article",{className:"hero-img animate","data-animate":"slideInRight 2s",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:myImg,className:"hero-photo",alt:"me"})})]})});};export default Hero;
